text: Sex & Philosophy (Original title: Sex O Phalsapheh, ) is a 2005 French Iranian Tajik romantic drama movie directed by Mohsen Makhmalbaf and starring Daler Nazarov, Mariam Gaibova, Farzona Beknazarova, Tahmineh Ebrahimova, Malohat Abdulloeva. == Other websites == * * Category:2005 romantic drama movies Category:French romance movies Category:French drama movies Category:Iranian movies Category:Tajik movies Category:Movies directed by Mohsen Makhmalbaf
title: Sex & Philosophy
